title: Reflective Tool-Based Learning Object Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on reflective learning activities conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, centered on practical mathematics applications for office/administrative working learners.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more learning objects for mathematical concepts using reflective tools.
Learners can improve their learning object designs two or more times through peer feedback.
Learners can develop one mathematics learning scenario reflecting diverse learning styles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
